description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Kulwant Nagi Affiliate Booster – Pros & Cons, Notice, and CTA Blocks for Affiliates.This issue affects Affiliate Booster – Pros & Cons, Notice, and CTA Blocks for Affiliates: from n/a through 3.0.5.

product.name: Affiliate Booster – Pros & Cons, Notice, and CTA Blocks for Affiliates
